EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Chargebacks&ShowbacksPCF_WP_Q417.Download Confirmatio
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Chargebacks & Showbacks in Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Chargebacks & Showbacks in Pivotal Cloud Foundry white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thanks-for-downloading-chargeback-and-showback-in-pivotal-cloud-foundry-white-paper]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
